revision.comment: Omega moved page [[SAMA5D2 Xplained Ultra]] to [[Atmel SAMA5D2 Xplained Ultra]]: fixed ;
revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Atmel |model=SAMA5D2 |revision=Xplained Ultra |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=79 |est_release_date=10/2015 |pcb_id=A08-2388/2 |type=development board |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Atmel |cpu1_model=ATSAM5D27 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MTFC4GLDEA-0M WT |fla2=4 |fla2_brand=Adesto Tech |fla2_model=AT25DF321A |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M16JT-125 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, J11 |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Micrel |eth_chip2_model=KSZ8081 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Advanced PMU;Qorvo;ACT8945A;;1;,,, 32-bit AVR microcontroller;Atmel;AT32UC3A4256;;1;,,, I2C 2Kbit Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24MAC402;;1;,,, Single Channel USB Power Distribution Switch;Sipex;SP2525A;;1;,,, Non-Inverting 3-State Buffer;On Semi;NL17SZ126;;4;,,, Low Capacitance Double Rail-to-rail ESD Protection Diode;NXP;PRTR5V0U2X;;1;,,, CMOS SPDT Switch;Analog Devices;ADG849;;1;,,, Complementary Pair Enhanced Mode MOSFET;Diodes Inc;DMC2400UV;;2;,,, Low-Voltage Adjustable Shunt Regulator;TI;TLV431A;;1;,,, Autoswitching Power Mux;Texas Instruments;TPS2113;;1;,,, 2.5 MHz Fixed-Ouput Synchronous Regulator;ON Semi;FAN48610;;1; |flags=SD Card slot, RGB LCD FPC, Arduino expansion |stock_boot=U-Boot;2015.01; |stock_os=Linux;3.18.0;Poky |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=blank |oui_eth=F0:C2:3D }} {{TagLine|SAMA5D2 Xplained Ultra}} :[https://ww1.microchip.com/downloads/en/DeviceDoc/Atmel-44028-32-bit-Cortex-A5-Microprocessor-SAMA5D2-Xplained-Ultra_User-Guide.pdf User Guide]
*[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/09/21/atmel-introduces-sama5d2-cortex-a5-soc-with-extended-temperature-range-lower-power-consumption/ ''Atmel Introduces SAMA5D2 Cortex A5 SoC'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/atmel-launches-ultra-efficient-linux-ready-cortex-a5-soc/ ''Atmel launches ultra efficient, Linux ready Cortex-A5 SoC'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.linux4sam.org/bin/view/Linux4SAM/Sama5d2XplainedMainPage ''SAMA5D2 Xplained Board'' on '''Linux & Open Source for AT91 Microchip Microprocessors''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Atmel]]'' ATSAMA5D27 :@500MHz (ARM Cortex A5) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 4MB NOR Flash, 4GB eMMC NAND, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Video Output: TFT LCD *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 Host, 1x Micro USB Device *Power Source: 5V 2A via microUSB
==Images== <gallery> File:SAMA5D2 Xplained Ultra Top.jpeg|Board Top File:SAMA5D2 Xplained Ultra Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
